name: bridger-mvp
description: Bridger MVP - Monorepo containing core app, auth app, and quiz app

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:quiz" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:auth"
scripts.build: npm run build:quiz && npm run build:core && npm run build:auth
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/quiz-app && npm install
